summary: The diff implements removal of Email from the Contact page and footer, and removal of Facebook from Follow Us sections in Contact and Footer. It also updates metadata/documentation-like files that mention additional unrelated features/changes not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/summary to describe broader product direction (e.g., shifting away from ordering/checkout and referencing WhatsApp/email/phone) beyond the specific request to remove Email/Facebook UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to remove Facebook from Follow Us and remove Email from Contact and footer; it did not request changes to project summaries/metadata describing broader feature scope.
evidence: project_state.json (truncated): summary includes "Shift away from online ordering/checkout" and mentions "WhatsApp/email/phone"

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository file summary text that references numerous unrelated features/components (cart context, checkout, share/publish dialog, sticky cart button changes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest scope is limited to removing Email/Facebook UI and ensuring the app builds; it does not request updating a file-inventory/summary document or introducing/mentioning other features.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated): entries referencing cart/checkout components and "Publish"/"share dialog" strings
